title: Bloomberg Markets: PayPal's Ready on `One Touch' Payment
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: PayPal's Ready on `One Touch' Payment
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Bill Ready Chief Operating Officer PayPal Discussing mobile tools to level the playing field for traditional retailers in the fight for customers with ecommerce sites.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
